Intent Classification


						from models import encoder, classifier


						def embed_text(encoder: Encoder, text: str):
							return encoder(text)


						def predict_vector(classifier: Classifier, vector: List):
							return classifier(vector)


						def find_intentions(encoder, classifier, text):
							vector = embed_text(encoder, text)
							prediction = predict_vector(classifier, vector)
							return prediction
